pages.text: Mimicubes are creatures similar to the Slimes of the Overworld and the Magma Cubes of the nether.$(br2)They can be found guarding End Cities.$(br2)When attacked, they will mimic the weapons and armor of their attacker. That means they will can learn to use a shield, sword, bow, crossbow, trident, food and more.
On death, Mimicubes may drop Mimicream. This it's a needed item used to make a powerfull weapon, Hemolymph Blaster
